event.description: Alex Gordon hit by pitch.
Mike Moustakas strikes out swinging and Alex Gordon caught stealing 2nd, catcher Jason Castro to shortstop Eduardo Escobar.
Lorenzo Cain walks.
Eric Hosmer grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Salvador Perez walks.
Paulo Orlando strikes out swinging.
Cheslor Cuthbert grounds into a double play, shortstop Eduardo Escobar to second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer. Salvador Perez out at 2nd.
Alcides Escobar lines out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Raul Mondesi strikes out swinging.
Alex Gordon flies out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Mike Moustakas strikes out swinging.
Lorenzo Cain singles on a line drive to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Eric Hosmer singles on a ground ball to right fielder Max Kepler. Lorenzo Cain to 2nd.
Salvador Perez pops out to shortstop Eduardo Escobar on the infield fly rule.
Paulo Orlando singles on a line drive to left fielder Eddie Rosario. Lorenzo Cain scores. Eric Hosmer to 2nd.
Cheslor Cuthbert lines out to right fielder Max Kepler.
Alcides Escobar flies out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Raul Mondesi flies out to right fielder Max Kepler.
Alex Gordon grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Mike Moustakas singles on a ground ball to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Pitching Change: Tyler Duffey replaces Hector Santiago.
Lorenzo Cain flies out to right fielder Max Kepler.
Eric Hosmer lines out to center fielder Byron Buxton.
Salvador Perez lines out sharply to third baseman Miguel Sano.
Pitching Change: Matt Belisle replaces Tyler Duffey.
Paulo Orlando called out on strikes.
Cheslor Cuthbert walks.
Alcides Escobar strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Taylor Rogers replaces Matt Belisle.
Raul Mondesi strikes out swinging.
Alex Gordon grounds out to first baseman Joe Mauer.
Pitching Change: Ryan Pressly replaces Taylor Rogers.
Mike Moustakas strikes out swinging.
Lorenzo Cain strikes out swinging.
Chris Gimenez remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive switch from third base to first base for Miguel Sano.
Pitching Change: Justin Haley replaces Ryan Pressly.
Eric Hosmer grounds out, shortstop Eduardo Escobar to first baseman Miguel Sano.
Salvador Perez grounds out, third baseman Chris Gimenez to first baseman Miguel Sano.
Paulo Orlando grounds out, second baseman Brian Dozier to first baseman Miguel Sano.
Brian Dozier pops out to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Max Kepler pops out to shortstop Alcides Escobar.
Byron Buxton called out on strikes.
Joe Mauer called out on strikes.
Miguel Sano walks.
Jason Castro walks. Miguel Sano to 2nd.
Eduardo Escobar singles on a ground ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Miguel Sano scores. Jason Castro to 2nd.
Eddie Rosario singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain. Jason Castro scores. Eduardo Escobar to 3rd. Eddie Rosario to 2nd on the throw.
Robbie Grossman walks.
Brian Dozier grounds into a force out, fielded by second baseman Raul Mondesi. Eduardo Escobar scores. Eddie Rosario to 3rd. Robbie Grossman out at 2nd. Brian Dozier to 1st.
With Max Kepler batting, Brian Dozier steals (1) 2nd base.
Max Kepler strikes out swinging.
Byron Buxton strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Miguel Sano flies out to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Jason Castro walks. Joe Mauer to 2nd.
Eduardo Escobar flies out to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Eddie Rosario flies out to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Robbie Grossman grounds out, shortstop Alcides Escobar to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Brian Dozier walks.
Max Kepler grounds out, shortstop Alcides Escobar to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Byron Buxton flies out to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Joe Mauer lines out sharply to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Miguel Sano strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Mike Minor replaces Ian Kennedy.
Jason Castro walks.
Eduardo Escobar lines into an unassisted double play, first baseman Eric Hosmer. Jason Castro doubled off 1st.
Eddie Rosario grounds out, second baseman Raul Mondesi to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Pitching Change: Nathan Karns replaces Mike Minor.
Robbie Grossman called out on strikes.
Brian Dozier singles on a ground ball to left fielder Alex Gordon.
With Max Kepler batting, Brian Dozier steals (2) 2nd base.
Max Kepler walks.
Byron Buxton strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer walks. Brian Dozier to 3rd. Max Kepler to 2nd.
Miguel Sano triples (1) on a sharp fly ball to right fielder Paulo Orlando. Brian Dozier scores. Max Kepler scores. Joe Mauer scores.
Pitching Change: Matt Strahm replaces Nathan Karns.
Jason Castro walks.
Eduardo Escobar homers (1) on a line drive to left center field. Miguel Sano scores. Jason Castro scores.
Eddie Rosario flies out to left fielder Alex Gordon.
Pitching Change: Chris Young replaces Matt Strahm.
Robbie Grossman grounds out to first baseman Eric Hosmer.
Brian Dozier flies out to right fielder Paulo Orlando.
Max Kepler singles on a ground ball to center fielder Lorenzo Cain.
Byron Buxton singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Cheslor Cuthbert. Max Kepler to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chris Gimenez replaces Joe Mauer.
Chris Gimenez pops out to second baseman Raul Mondesi.
